page.title: 20 RECREATION IN LITCHAM.
page.content: The main organised clubs or pastimes are held at Litcham High School,both in the school day and out of school hours.They are mainly sports and hobbies taken by a teacher.There are also things to do in the area,although not so many for the older people.Some typical recreation places in the village are the youth club,the common, talking down the road,bowls and tennis at the club.There are several organised clubs,but transport is a problem for chidren.The survey results show that a lot of people in this area prefer just to meet friends but several clubs are also very popular. Prefered activities of those asked:- Watching T.V. 20% Talking/Meeting friends 32% Sports clubs etc 20% Going to the cinema 16% Shopping/Around town 12%
